infernium.infernium_sword.tooltip:
§6§oForged in the depths of The Nether centuries ago.
A truly deadly sword.§r

§2Sets enemies on fire for 2 seconds when hit.
infernium.infernium_pickaxe.tooltip:
§6§oA powerful pickaxe that true miners use.§r

§2Sets enemies on fire for 2 seconds when hit.
infernium.infernium_axe.tooltip:
§6§oBuilt for war and deforesting.
This axe has seen a lot of blood.§r

§2Sets enemies on fire for 3 seconds when hit.
infernium.infernium_shovel.tooltip:
§6§oPerfect for digging graves.§r

§2Sets enemies on fire for 2 seconds when hit.
infernium.infernium_hoe.tooltip:
§6§oDid you really just craft this?§r

§2Sets enemies on fire for 1 second when hit.
infernium.infernium_helmet.tooltip: §6§oThe warmth feels pretty nice on your head.
infernium.infernium_chestplate.tooltip: §6§oYou could probably cook an egg on it.
infernium.nihilium_ingot.tooltip: You can feel the energy pulsing.
infernium.nihilium_bow.tooltip:
§d§oA bow used by ancient hunters.
This weapon marks the end of any foe.
infernium.nihilium_pickaxe.tooltip: §d§oAn ancient pickaxe. It's very hard and durable.
infernium.nihilium_helmet.tooltip: §d§oYou hear the energy while wearing the helmet.
infernium.nihilium_chestplate.tooltip: §d§oThe pulses of energy send chills down your spine.
